title: Oathbreaker
content:
actions. Spiteful Suffering: Steep an enemy in the darkness that churns within you. The target takes 1d4 + Charisma Modifier Necrotic damage each turn and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage. Control Undead: Use the power of your Oath to gain control over an undead creature. The undead will follow you around and attack your enemies. The target's level must be lower than yours. Dreadful Aspect: Let your darkest emotions burst forth as a menacing pulse to Frighten nearby enemies.

BG3 Paladin
